metadata.title: CVE-2019-12802 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 through 3.5.1, the rcc_context function of libr/egg/egg_lang.cmishandles changing context. This allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact(invalid memory access in r_egg_lang_parsechar; invalid free inrcc_pusharg).

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
